channel.title: Compile help needed badly
channel.description: So i heard when you change the server IP to your ip, you change something in the compile and run.bat and runserver and other programs to something, I have 6.0.25 java, if you could write what to put thanks! I'm new, don't flame please. :X i've looked in many places, no one has helped though.

item.title: Compile help needed badly
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help needed badly
item.dc:creator: @Dj_Nm.E Dj Nm.E
item.description:
@Dj_Nm.E wrote:

justinTG:

So i heard when you change the server IP to your ip, you change something in the compile and run.bat and runserver and other programs to something, I have 6.0.25 java, if you could write what to put thanks! I’m new, don’t flame please. :X i’ve looked in many places, no one has helped though.

No. if you change the ip on your server you dont need to change anything on your compiler…
if when you compile it says Something about cant find the path. then you gotta put the type of java you have ex)(
6.0.25_24 or so…

Read full topic
